aboutheroparagraph: Tabadul is a startup company that was established on the first of April in the year 2023. Tabadul is a site that provides a service, which is the sharing of things between people. The Tabadul site allows users to register an account. By registering the account, you will be able to add products to be shared with others. Phone the donor's email and communicate with him, and there are many services that will be increased in the coming days
